S04n448:5: ekasmin samaye bhagavāṃllaṅkāpure samudramalayaśikhare viharati sma nānāratnagotrapuṣpapratimaṇḍite mahatā bhikṣusaṃghena sārdhaṃ mahatā ca bodhisattvagaṇena nānābuddhakṣetrasaṃnipatitairbodhisattvairmahāsattvaiḥ anekasamādhivaśitābalābhijñāvikrīḍitairmahāmatibodhisattvapūrvaṃgamaiḥ sarvabuddhapāṇyabhiṣekābhiṣiktaiḥ svacittadṛśyagocaraparijñānārthakuśalairnānāsattvacittacaritrarūpanayavinayadhāribhiḥ pañcadharmasvabhāvavijñānanairātmyādvayagatiṃgataiḥ ||
S04n448:6: tena khalu punaḥ samayena bhagavān sāgaranāgarājabhavanāt saptāhenottīrṇa'bhūt |
S04n448:7: anekaśakrabrahmanāgakanyākoṭibhiḥ pratyudgamyamāno laṅkāmalayamavalokya smitamakarot-pūrvakairapi tathāgatairarhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhairasmiṃllaṅkāpurīmalayaśikhare svapratyātmāryajñānatarkadṛṣṭitīrthyaśrāvakapratyekabuddhāryaviṣaye tadbhāvito dharmo deśitaḥ |
S04n448:8: yannvahamapi atraiva rāvaṇaṃ yakṣādhipatimadhikṛtya etadevodbhāvayan dharmaṃ deśayeyam ||
S04n448:9: aśrauṣīdrāvaṇo rākṣasādhipatistathāgatādhiṣṭhānāt-bhagavān kila sāgaranāgarājabhavanāduttīrya anekaśakrabrahmanāgakanyākoṭibhiḥ parivṛtaḥ puraskṛtaḥ samudrataraṃgānavalokya ālayavijñānodadhipravṛttivijñānapavanaviṣaye preritāṃstebhyaḥ saṃnipatitebhyaścittānyavalokya tasminneva sthitaḥ udānamudānayati sma-yannvahaṃ gatvā bhagavantamadhyeṣya laṅkāṃ praveśayeyam |
S04n448:10: tanme syāddīrgharātramarthāya hitāya sukhāya devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca ||
S04n448:11: atha rāvaṇo rākṣasādhipatiḥ saparivāraḥ pauṣpakaṃ vimānamadhiruhya yena bhagavāṃstenopajagāma |
S04n448:12: upetya vimānādavatīrya saparivāro bhagavantaṃ triṣkṛtvaḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya tūryatālāvacaraiḥ pravādyadbhirindranīlamayena daṇḍena vaiḍūryamusāra(galva)
S04n448:13: pratyuptāṃ vīṇāṃ priyaṅgupāṇḍunā anardhyeṇa vastreṇa pārśvāvalambitāṃ kṛtvā ṣaḍjarṣabhagāndhāradhaivataniṣādamadhyamakaiśikagītasvaragrāmamūrchanādiyuktenānusārya salīlaṃ vīṇāmanupraviśya gāthābhigītairanugāyati sma -
S04n448:17: pratyātmavedyagatidharmarataṃ laṅkāṃ hi gantu samayo'dya mune || 2 ||
S04n448:19: deśehi nātha iha dharmavaraṃ śroṣyanti yakṣa bahurūpadharāḥ || 3 ||
S04n448:20: atha rāvaṇo laṅkādhipatiḥ toṭakavṛttenānugāyya punarapi gāthābhigītenānugāyati sma -
S04n448:25: ṛddhyā gatvā tamadhvānaṃ yatra tiṣṭhati nāyakaḥ |
S04n448:29: anugṛhṇāhi me laṅkāṃ ye cāsmin puravāsinaḥ || 7 ||
S04n448:34: śrotukāmā vayaṃ cādya ye ca laṅkānivāsinaḥ || 9 ||
S04n448:52: anukampārthaṃ mahyaṃ vai yāhi laṅkāṃ sutaiḥ saha || 17 ||
S04n448:55: ājñākaro'haṃ buddhānāṃ ye ca teṣāṃ jinātmajāḥ |
S04n448:56: nāsti tadyanna deyaṃ me anukampa mahāmune || 19 ||
S04n448:67: tatra gatvā purīṃ ramyāṃ punaḥ pūjāṃ pralabdhavān |
S04n448:77: ahaṃ hi śrotā yakṣāśca jinaputrāśca sanniha |
S04n448:80: adhyeṣayāmi tvāṃ bhaktyā nayaṃ pṛccha viśārada || 30 ||
S04n448:87: atra tāḥ parṣadaḥ sarvā ekaikasmin hi dṛśyate |
S04n448:88: sarvakṣetrāṇi tatraiva ye ca teṣu vināyakāḥ || 34 ||
S04n448:97: cinteti kimidaṃ ko'yaṃ deśitaṃ kena vā śrutam |
S04n448:98: kiṃ dṛṣṭaṃ kena vā dṛṣṭaṃ nagaro vā kva saugataḥ || 38 ||
S04n448:99: tāni kṣetrāṇi te buddhā ratnaśobhāḥ kva saugatāḥ |
S04n448:103: atha vā dharmatā hyeṣā dharmāṇāṃ cittagocare |
S04n448:105: na draṣṭā na ca draṣṭavyaṃ na vācyo nāpi vācakaḥ |
S04n448:107: ye paśyanti yathādṛṣṭaṃ na te paśyanti nāyakam || 42 ||
S04n448:110: samanantaraprativibuddhe parāvṛttāśraye svacittadṛśyamātrādhigame'vikalpapracārasthitasya laṅkādhipateḥ pūrvakuśalamūlasaṃcoditasya sarvaśāstravidagdhabuddheryathātathyadarśanasya aparapraṇeyasya svabuddhivicālanakuśalasya tarkadṛṣṭivyapetadarśanasya aparapraṇeyasya mahāyogayogino mahāviśvarūpadhāriṇaḥ upāyakauśalyagatiṃgatasya sarvabhūmyuttarottarasvalakṣaṇādhigamanakuśalasya cittamagomanovijñānasvabhāvavivekaratasya trisaṃtativyavacchinnadarśanasya sarvakāraṇatīrthyavyapetabuddheḥ tathāgatagarbhabuddhabhūmyadhyātmasamāpannasya sthitabuddhabuddhergaganādadhyātmavedyaśabdamaśrauṣīt-sādhu sādhu laṅkādhipate,
S04n448:112: evaṃ śikṣitavyaṃ yoginā yathā tvaṃ śikṣase |
S04n448:123: eṣa laṅkādhipate abhisamayo mahāyogināṃ parapravādamathanānāmakuśaladṛṣṭidālanānāmātmadṛṣṭivyāvartanakuśalānāṃ sūkṣmamabhivijñānaparāvṛttikuśalānāṃ jinaputrāṇāṃ mahāyānacaritānām |
S04n448:125: evaṃ kriyamāṇe bhūyo'pyuttarottaraviśodhako'yaṃ laṅkādhipate mārgo yastvayā parigṛhītaḥ samādhikauśalasamāpattyā |
S04n448:135: atha tasminnantare rāvaṇasyaitadabhavat-yannvahaṃ punarapi bhagavantaṃ sarvayogavaśavartinaṃ tīrthyayogavyāvartakaṃ pratyātmagatigocarodbhāvakaṃ nairmitanairmāṇikavyapetamadhigamabuddhiryadyogināṃ yogābhisamayakāle samādhimukhe samāptānāmadhigamo bhavati |
S04n448:136: tasya ca adhigamādyogināṃ yogaśabdo nipātyate adhigamaneneti |
S04n448:137: tadahaṃ kāruṇikaṃ kleśendhanavikalpakṣayakaraṃ taṃ jinaputraiḥ parivṛtaṃ sarvasattvacittāśayānupraviṣṭaṃ sarvagataṃ sarvajñaṃ kriyālakṣaṇavinivṛttaṃ tayaivamṛddhyā paśyeyam,
S04n448:139: adhigataṃ ca me nirvikalpācāraḥ sukhasamādhisamāpattivihārastathāgatagatibhūmiprāpako vivṛddhiṃ yāyāt ||
S04n448:140: atha bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāṃ laṅkādhipateranutpattikadharmakṣāntyadhigataṃ viditvā tayaiva śobhayā daśagrīvasyānukampayā punarapyātmānaṃ śikhare subahuratnakhacite ratnajālavitate darśayati sma |
S04n448:141: adrākṣīddaśagrīvo laṅkādhipatiḥ punarapi dṛṣṭānubhūtāṃ śobhāṃ śikhare tathāgatamarhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ dvātriṃśadvaralakṣaṇavibhūṣitatanum |
S04n448:142: svātmabhāvaṃ caikekasmin girau tathāgatānāṃ purataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ mahāmatinā sārdhaṃ tathāgatapratyātmagatigocarakathāṃ prakurvantaṃ yakṣaiḥ parivṛtaṃ tāṃ deśanāpāṭhakathāṃ kathayantam |
S04n448:144: atha bhagavān punarapi tasyāṃ velāyāṃ parṣadamavalokya buddhyā na māṃsacakṣuṣā siṃharājavadvijṛmbhya mahāhāsamahasat |
S04n448:145: ūrṇākośācca raśmiṃ niścāryamāṇaḥ pārśvorukaṭikāyācca śrīvatsātsarvaromakūpebhyo yugāntāgniriva dīpyamānaḥ tejasendradhanurudayabhāskaropamena prabhāmaṇḍalena dedīpyamānaḥ śakrabrahmalokapālairgaganatale nirīkṣyamāṇaḥ sumeruśṛṅgapratispardhini śikhare niṣaṇṇo mahāhāsamahasat |
S04n448:146: atha tasyā bodhisattvaparṣadaḥ teṣāṃ ca śakrabrahmādīnāmetadabhavat-ko nu khalvatra hetuḥ,
S04n448:147: ka ḥ pratyayo yadbhagavān sarvadharmavaśavartī mahāhāsaṃ smitapūrvakaṃ hasati ?
S04n448:149: niścārya tūṣṇīmabhavat svapratyātmāryajñānagocarasamādhimukhe patitāśayo'vismitaḥ siṃhāvalokanatayā diśo'valokya rāvaṇasyaiva yogagatipracāramanuvicintayamānaḥ ||
S04n448:150: atha khalu mahāmatirbodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ pūrvamevādhyeṣito rāvaṇasyānukampāmupādāya tasyā bodhisattvaparṣadaścittāśayavicāramājñāya anāgatāṃ janatāṃ cāvalokya deśanāpāṭhābhiratānāṃ sattvānāṃ cittavibhramo bhaviṣyatīti yathārutārthābhiniviṣṭānāṃ sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhatīrthyayogabalābhiniviṣṭānāṃ tathāgatā api bhagavanto vinivṛttavijñānaviṣayā mahāhāsaṃ hasanti |
S04n448:151: teṣāṃ kautūhalavinivṛttyarthaṃ bhagavantaṃ paripṛcchati sma-kaḥ khalvatra hetuḥ,
S04n448:155: lokasvabhāvamavalokya kudṛṣṭipatitānāṃ ca lokānāṃ traikālyacittāvabodhāya māṃ praṣṭumārabdhaḥ |
S04n448:157: eṣa mahāmate rāvaṇo laṅkādhipatiḥ pūrvakānapi tathāgatānarhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhān praśnadvayaṃ pṛṣṭavān |
S04n448:159: ya eṣa praṣṭukāmo daśagrīvo'nāgatānapi jinān prakṣyati ||
S04n448:164: ahaṃ te tasta tasyaiva praśnasyavyākaraṇena cittamārādhayiṣyāmi |
S04n448:165: yathā tvaṃ parāvṛttavikalpāśraye bhūmivipakṣakauśalena pravicayabuddhyā vicārayamāṇaḥ pratyātmanayalakṣaṇasamādhisukhavihāraṃ samādhibuddhaiḥ parigṛhītaḥ śamathasukhavyavasthitaḥ śrāvakapratyekabuddhasamādhipakṣānatikramya acalāsādhumatīdharmameghābhūmivyavasthito dharmanairātmyayathātathākuśalo mahāratnapadmavimāne samādhijinābhiṣekatāṃ pratilapsyase |
S04n448:166: tadanurūpaiḥ padmaiḥ svakāyavicitrādhiṣṭhānādhiṣṭhitaistaiḥ padmaiḥ svakāyaṃ niṣaṇṇaṃ drakṣyasi,
S04n448:172: atha khalu laṅkādhipatirbhagavatā kṛtāvakāśa utthāya tasmādraśmivimalaprabhādratnapadmasadṛśādratnaśikharāt sāpsarogaṇaparivṛto vividhairanekavidhairnānāprakāraiḥ puṣpamālyagandhadhūpavilepanacchatradhvajapatākāhārārdhahārakirīṭamukuṭairanyaiśca adṛṣṭaśrutapūrvairābharaṇaviśeṣairviśiṣṭaistūryatālāvacarairdevanāgayakṣarākṣasagandharvakinnaramahoragamanuṣyātikrāntaiḥ sarvakāmadhātuparyāpannān vādyabhāṇḍānabhinirmāya ye cānyeṣu buddhakṣetreṣu tūryaviśeṣā dṛṣṭāḥ,
S04n448:173: tānabhinirmāya bhagavantaṃ bodhisattvāṃśca ratnajālenāvaṣṭabhya nānāvastrocchritapatākaṃ kṛtvā sapta tālān gagane'bhyudgamya mahāpūjāmeghānabhipravṛṣya tūryatālāvacarāṇi nirnādya tasmādgaganādavatīrya sūryavidyutprabhe dvitīye mahāratnapadmālaṃkṛtau ratnaśikhare niṣasāda |
S04n448:174: niṣadya upacārātsmitapūrvaṃ bhagavatā kṛtāvakāśo bhagavanta praśnadvayaṃ pṛcchati sma-pṛṣṭā mayā pūrvakāstathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ |
S04n448:183: tatsādhu me bhagavān svayameva dharmavaśavartī dharmadvayaṃ tathāgato'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho deśayatu |
S04n448:193: dṛṣṭo ghaṭādīnāṃ bhedanātmakānāṃ vināśadharmiṇāṃ bālavikalpagocaraiḥ prativibhāgaḥ |
S04n448:197: tiṣṭhantu tāvallaṅkādhipate ghaṭādayo bhāvā vicitralakṣaṇapatitā bālānāṃ na tvāryāṇām |
S04n448:203: evaṃ sarvadharmaprarohadharmiṇāṃ bāhyānāmādhyātmikānāmapyavidyāniryātānāṃ skandhadhātvāyatanopagānāṃ sarvadharmāṇāṃ traidhātukopapannānāṃ dṛṣṭasukhasaṃsthānāmabhilāpyagativiśeṣāḥ |
S04n448:204: vijñānānāmekalakṣaṇānāṃ viṣayābhigrahaṇapravṛttānāṃ dṛṣṭo hīnotkṛṣṭamadhyamaviśeṣo vyavadānāvyavadānataśca kuśalākuśalataśca |
S04n448:215: svacittadṛśyadharmatābhiniveśānna santi ghaṭādayo dharmā bālaparikalpitā alabdhaśarīrāḥ |
S04n448:218: ye'labdhātmakā lakṣaṇavikalpāpracārā dharmā ahetukāḥ teṣāmapravṛttirdṛṣṭā bhūtābhūtataḥ |
S04n448:228: yaduktavānasi laṅkādhipate dharmādharmāḥ kathaṃ praheyā iti,
S04n448:230: yadapyuktavānasi laṅkādhipate-pūrvakā api tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā mayā pṛṣṭāḥ,
S04n448:255: tadyathā darpaṇāntargataṃ svabimbapratibimbaṃ jale vā svāṅgacchāyā vā jyotsnādīpapradīpite vā gṛhe vā aṅgacchāyā pratiśrutkāni |
